short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension to manage tabs group

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabs group manager is a Chrome extension that allows you to group your tabs for quick access.
With Tabs group manager, you can organize your tabs into groups, and you have several ways to open all tabs in the group.

Some other features include:
- group ordering (drag and drop)
- View group details

Tabs group manager is easy to use and can greatly improve your productivity. Give it a try and see the difference it can make for you!
